headline: Chip Stocks Take Hit From Trump Threat to Ramp Up China Tariffs
summary: Semiconductor stocks tumbled Friday morning after President Trump threatened to increase tariffs on China. The Philadelphia Semiconductor Index fell 4% after Trump posted the tariff threat in response to China's recent decision to restrict rare-earth materials.

raw.headline: Chip Stocks Take Hit From Trump Threat to Ramp Up China Tariffs
raw.summary: Semiconductor stocks tumbled Friday morning after President Trump threatened to increase tariffs on China. The Philadelphia Semiconductor Index fell 4% after Trump posted the tariff threat in response to China's recent decision to restrict rare-earth materials.

headline: S&P Futures Tick Higher With Focus on U.S. Confidence Data and Fed Speak
summary: December S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESZ25) are trending up +0.10% this morning, attempting to end the up-and-down week on a positive note, while investors await the release of the University of Michigan’s preliminary reading on U.S. consumer sentiment and remarks from Federal Reserve officials.

headline: High Bandwidth Memory Global Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Samsung, SK Hynix, Micron Technology, Intel, AMD, Nvidia, Amkor, Powertech, United Microelectronics
summary: The global High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) market is forecasted to grow from USD 2.93 billion in 2024 to USD 16.72 billion by 2033, at a CAGR of 21.35%. This expansion is driven by the surging demand in AI, data centers, gaming, and high-performance computing sectors. HBM offers superior data transfer rates and energy efficiency, essential for modern computing needs. The market report covers various applications such as servers, consumer electronics, and automotive, and highlights technological adva
